item.description: Volunteer at Boston GreenFest 2011! It is organized by the Foundation For a Green Future. As the region's largest multicultural environmental festival, Boston GreenFest celebrates the many ways we can create a better world by greening our lives and our communities. We need volunteers that can help during August 16-20! Volunteer for a couple of hours or a couple of days! For more information, contact bob@bostongreenfest.org. Sign up here: http://bostongreenfes...
item.name: Boston GreenFest
